REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Apocalypse survivor
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME was born during a time of unrest on HIS homeworld, as climate change threatened mass starvation and flooding. As HE grew up the situation worsened - billions died and peaceful states descended into anarchy. NAME and HIS parents did whatever they had to to survive.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Caveworld tender
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME grew up in cave complex deep beneath the surface of an inhospitable world. HECAP worked with the other children tending the tribe's fungus crops.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Caveworld tunneler
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME worked as a digger in a massive underground cave complex. HECAP knows rock so well that HE can almost navigate caves by smell.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Child spy
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Children are often presumed innocent, and can be ideal as spies. NAME was trained in the art of infiltration and information-gathering when HE was just nine years old. HISCAP years behind enemy lines and the war-torn nature of HIS homeworld meant HE had limited opportunity for education.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Child star
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME was well-known throughout HIS homeworld as a child actor in films and TV shows. HISCAP fame put HIM in contact with many different kinds of people, but also tended to get in the way of HIS education.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Coma child
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: A childhood accident put NAME into a coma. HECAP didn't wake up until HE was in HIS late teens. HISCAP body never recovered from the years of inactivity, but people tend to take pity on HIM when they hear HIS story.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Cult child
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME was born into a powerful cult which shunned advanced technology and believed that all illness could be cured by cleansing the soul through sacred art. After HIS first glimpse of the outside world, HE decided to run away.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Frightened child
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME grew up with a laundry list of phobias and neuroses. HECAP feared, among other things, doctors and foodborne pathogens. As a result, HE learned to cook and care for HIMself, but many of HIS fears dog HIM in adulthood.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Industrial orphan
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME never knew HIS parents. HISCAP earliest memories were of drudgery in the mines and workhouses of HIS industrial world. Because of this, HE never received a proper education.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Medical assistant
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME was born during a catastrophic war in which both sides used napalm extensively. HECAP grew up helping HIS parents in an infirmary, treating the cascade of horrific burns from the battlefields. HECAP was left with a lifelong fear of fire.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Music lover
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: As a child, NAME had a talent for playing musical instruments and singing. HECAP was given expert training and loved to perform in recitals and concerts, though the lavish praise HE received made HIM a little self-obsessed.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Mute
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME was greatly affected by a traumatic event early in HIS life. For many years HE refused to speak to people, preferring instead to play with HIS household's numerous pets.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Organ farm
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME was raised in an illegal underground organ farm. HISCAP body was used to grow organic implants for wounded mercenaries. Though HIS upbringing has left HIM haunted, it has also given HIM a unique understanding of human biology.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Pyromaniac
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: From an early age, NAME had an unhealthy fascination with fire. HECAP would set refuse heaps ablaze and become so entranced by the flames HE would absent-mindedly burn HIMself. One day while playing with matches, HE carelessly burned down HIS home.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Refugee
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: War broke out in NAME's home when HE was a baby. HISCAP parents fled with HIM, seeking safety wherever they could find it. NAME's earliest memories are of being taught how to defend HIMself. The violence and destruction HE witnessed left HIM scarred for life.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Scout
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Born to colonial administrators from a small imperial power, NAME was enrolled in a youth program that taught military scouting skills. HECAP learned to survive in the wilderness, to obey, and not to ask questions.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Shelter child
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME grew up in a shelter deep beneath a toxic world. HECAP received a comprehensive education, but had no opportunity to do physical labour.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Shopkeeper
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME's mother was often ill, and it fell to HIM to run the store which was their only source of income. HECAP learned a little about the exotic artifacts which HE sold, and a lot about the art of the deal.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Sickly child
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: As a child, NAME suffered from a rare disease. Quarantined in a research hospital, HE had minimal human contact and got little physical exercise. In the sterile hospital environment, however, HE became very familiar with science and medicine.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Story writer
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: As a child, NAME was addicted to reading. HECAP would spend all day in HIS local library with HIS nose in a book. When budget cuts forced the library to close, NAME was distraught. HE decided to fill the gap by writing HIS own stories instead.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Test subject
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: On the most corrupt urbworlds, scientists without a moral compass commit unspeakable atrocities in the name of research. NAME was kept alone in a sealed facility from birth and subjected to a variety of behavioural experiments in an attempt to turn HIM into a perfect super-soldier.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Urbworld urchin
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: The urbworlds - ancient and deep industrial cityscapes bursting with humanity and poison. NAME grew up in the dark, unwanted reaches of such a place. HECAP had to fight for every scrap of food.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Vatgrown soldier
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME wasn't made as a person, but as an instrument of destruction. Grown in a bioweapons facility and taught combat during HIS accelerated growth, NAME still has a proclivity for combat of all kinds and an aversion to human contact.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Wreckage explorer
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Two generations before NAME was born, an apocalyptic war dragged HIS home planet into anarchy. NAME was tasked with watching HIS tribe's herds, but often shirked HIS duties to go exploring the crashed warships scattered around the planet.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Convent child
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: The child of an illicit affair, NAME was bought up by nuns in a medieval convent. HECAP learned the value of hard work and submission, but was taught that technology is heretical.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Medieval lordling
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME was a minor noble in an old kingdom on a medieval world. HECAP grew up in a manor made of stone, served by bowing lowerclassmen. Such a life teaches no technical skills and instils a lifelong aversion to manual labor - but NAME learned early the ways of social manipulation.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Medieval slave
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME grew up pulling carts and digging holes on a medieval world. Simple manual labor is HIS oldest companion - along with the master's lash. HECAP didn't learn to read until age nine.
